item.title: Social Media Support for new men's health podcast - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a part-time Social Media Manager to support our new podcast launch.

You will be responsible for creating:
* Managing our social media accounts (using Later.com social media calendar)
* Focus on effective content creation for INSTAGRAM and LINKEDIN initially. Likely activating TikTok and others soon.
* Image/video asset management (weekly social clip creation via Opus or Riverside)
* Setup and manage our email campaigns promoting the podcast (then future membership offerings to come)
* Developing our brand voice and overall social POV
* Support with blog content development, AI content creation tools, content partnership efforts etc.
* Managing social calendar updates in Asana, tracking team deliverables etc.
* Responsible for creation (with AI tools) and editing of show notes for each episode

Requirements:
* This role requires a strong understanding of social media management and social marketing strategies
* You have the ability to plan, accept feedback and then execute the plan
* You should be proficient in conducting research, increasing engagement,
* Reasonable proficiency in graphic design tools (e.g. Canva)
* Strong communication and writing skills (we like grammar here)
* Ability to work collaboratively within a small, lean team
* Reasonable familiarity with podcast tools such as Podbean, Buzzsprout, Opus, Patreon, Chatable etc

Also amazing if you:
* Are familiar with the podcasting industry and the world of mental/emotional health a big plus!
* Have a sense of humor (we "laugh with" not at)
* Can edit video/audio

About us
* Podcast: Halftime with Jon
* Website: www.halftime.network
* Instagram: @halftimewithjon
* Season 1 Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o72MEHESPxM
